page.title: 13ATTITUDES,SPETCHLEY AREA
page.content: There is an air of rural peace and prosperity in this quiet part of Worcestershire. Traditional country events are celebrated and there is pride in the attractiveness of the local countryside. {Politics:}The whole of our grid comes under the area of Bowbrook Ward and remained Conservative in the May 1985 local election . {Conservation: }The conservation of wildlife and an interest in the very varied flora and fauna of the area is especially noticeable.Country living includes{traditional sports Fishing and shooting take place in season and the hunt passes through Spetchley three times a year. Spetchley Park also has its own cricket team. The hall and its occupants provide the social scene.
